website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 890 v8 is a neutral running shoe that works best for runners and athletes with normal gaits. This road running shoe is an excellent choice for consumers seeking a healthy combination of comfort, stability, and lightness. It is ideal for daily training and workout sessions. Also, the FuelCell 890v8’s minimalistic yet stylish design makes the platform suitable for casual wear.
pros: Several users are satisfied with the comfort that the New Balance 890 v8 provides
A few runners appreciate the shoe’s firm and responsive midsole
It feels light and fast, according to a couple of commenters
Some wearers have testified that this running shoe is breathable
Many reviewers like the simple yet stylish design of this running partner
cons: One tester dislikes that the New Balance 890 v8 feels heavier and bulkier than its predecessors
A buyer complains about the inflexible sole of the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Like running on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable trainer I’ve used in years. The ride is like racing flats with simultaneous punch and cushion hybrid. That FuellCell in the mids is really amazing. Took 1 star off because I found there was a bit too much padding in the heel/tongue and the front mesh could have been a bit more breathable like the 1500’s. But! I got this on sale for $68 so all in all - way above expectations for a sub $100 trainer.
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on my foot. Like the room in the box. Ventilates very well. Excellent throughout the sole for stability and comfort. Other NBs this size fit well left and right. This one 1/4 size too large left foot. Wearing a thicker sock isn’t enough. I own two other 890s this version this size—no problem.
customer_reviews.author: VetintheWest

customer_reviews.title: Fuelcell a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Have. owned a previous version of 890. Sole on previous version was stable and wore well. The fuelcell is far less stable and already showing signs of wear. As a long time New Balance user their “experiments” are causing me to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bratton

customer_reviews.title: 890’s are great
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a little tight at first. After the first run they seem to have loosened a little. I’m a huge fan of the 890 series and so far these are a winner
customer_reviews.author: T.Stark

customer_reviews.title: Regret this purchase. Will return
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Not the most comfortable. Mesh. Cheaply made. Hate the color of red.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: So good so far
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Running at least 30 miles a week on them- doing great so far- had them for a month
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I brought this sneaker in size 2E. Unfortunately, It was too narrow so I had to return it for a 4E different model shoe because it was not available for this sneaker. Price and quality were great though.
customer_reviews.author: David H Baron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing shoe by New Balance. Fit perfectly. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Goggans

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Ran with 890s through my military career. Loved them every step of the way. I recently purchased the V8 and was pretty satisfied with my first run with them and would encourage anyone to give them a go. The style is a little different but they grew on me. I was telling my girlfriend that i actually wanted to buy two or three more pair just in case New Balance decided to discontinue their 890 series again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneak
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only worn NB since 2015. I’ve had 4 pairs of version 6 which typically wear for shorts races and speed work (awesome). These feel really good so far after about 60 miles. Like them much better than Vongo4.
customer_reviews.author: justin whipkey

customer_reviews.title: These look great and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: The look on these shoes are very easy on the eyes and the traction of the grip on the bottom is some of the best I have ever had. As someone with a size 16 shoe, these have been a fantastic find. Would definitely buy again. With that being said, I have narrow feet for my size so if you have wide feet these might feel a little cramped.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. The fit was perfect right out of the box. He wears a 9.5 wide. It provides comfort and support in an athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLady 808

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I like nike's better. Wearing just doesn't feel good. It doesn't look good too. It's hard and rigged.
customer_reviews.author: Huy V.

customer_reviews.title: Red color is actually pink
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Fit nicely but crimson color was essentially a deep pink. Not really accurately reflected on the site. Would look nice on a women’s shoe.
customer_reviews.author: tjv064

product_meta.title: New Balance Unisex Adults’ M890bm8 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: New Balance Men's M890bm8 Slippers Black 45
